front.title: Passive Duplicate Address Detection for On-demand Routing Protocols

abstract.t: This document describes passive DAD schemes over on-demand ad-hoc routing protocols such as AODV and DYMO. In order to achieve these two goals: (a) improving the accuracy of detecting address conflicts and (b) reducing the time taken to detect these conflicts, this document provides several schemes using additional information including sequence, location, or neighbor knowledge.
